name: REQUISITION VR
description:
Welcome to Nevermont, a small state on the East coast surrounded by mountains and the coastal strip. And there’s Autumn, the capital of the state, the town with a rich history. A great place to spend your vacation! Oh, wait… Forget about it and prepare yourself for the freaking end of the world!

When something terrible happens that causes the sky to turn yellow, when streets are covered in mystical fog and people suddenly turn into monsters, you have two choices: give up or fight for your life.

Now it’s your turn to show that creativity it’s not just something that is useful in an art class only.

Duct tape is your new friend. Books are no longer a source of education and flour isn’t something to cook with. Search various locations for items and craft unique weapons, traps, and bombs to stop hordes of mutants or your teammates.

What happened to Autumn? You are the first one to learn the truth.

Key Features:


Crafting system

Over 300 different items are scattered around the location and waiting for being crafted into the weapons, bombs, and traps

Melee combat

Now it’s time to forget about stealth and smash enemies’ heads using any object you can find

Locations

Get ready to visit different locations from the trailer park to the farm.
Remember there are no more safe places!

EA Game modes
Sandbox - get used to environment, know your weapon and spawn zombies whenever you want!
Story Mode - find out what happened to Autumn!
PVP - fight your teammates cause they are no longer your friends!

The various playable characters
Choose and customize your best fighter
